title: DiversiTea Tea Dictionary
intro: From FTGFOP1 graded black tea to funky chocolate cake tea, DiversiTea has created a tea dictionary that you could take a tea tour around the world.

splash.title: Welcome to the tea dictionary
splash.text: We have gathered all the teas that we have curated so far, so feel free to have a look and order the teas that you fancy!

contact.title: Do you have any questions?
contact.text: Please drop us an email if you have any questions regarding our tea, or any tea in general. We would be more than happy to answer them!

points.paragraph: Not sure what you could like? Take our **Tea quiz** {.ma0 .lh-copy}
Drop us a direct message through our [Facebook](www.facebook.com/diversiteabox){.link .blue) or [Instagram](www.instagram.com/diversiteabox){.link .blue} {.ma0 .lh-copy}
If you have any more enquiries, drop us an email using the contact form or at <mailto:team@diversitea.co>{.link .blue} {.ma0 .lh-copy}
